name: 楊詠荍　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原 理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺 陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物 理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度 、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
This course is a basic topics of Materials Science.
schedule:
Introduction to the course
Atomic structure and interatomic bonding
The structure of crystalline solids
Crystal chemistry
Important structures type
Solid solutions and crystal defects
Mid term exam
Introduction to electrical properties
Electrical characteristics of materials
Applications of electrical phenomea
Final exam
materials: An Introduction, W.D. Callister, Jr. and D.G. Rethwisch, 10th edition, John Wiley and Sons, Inc. (2018).
